data.name: ben
data.value: How you doing out there Leo?

data.name: leo
data.value: I’m doing okay. This happened when we played basketball for wii sports too. You haven't done it in so long your body's confident that you can, or your brain is, and then once you're out of the life or death situation of will I get Dairy Queen or not, right? Then it catches up to you.

data.name: janet
data.value: Chat says Leo looks like grown-up Charlie Brown.

data.name: ben
data.value: Charles Brown. Technically there’s water in front of you.

data.name: janet
data.value: I'm so just shocked that you both went on this walk and didn't bring water!

data.name: ben
data.value: It’s April in Minnesota. How ‘hot could it get?’ is what we thought.

data.name: janet
data.value: But you always need water. Water’s not about heat… but… anyway.

data.name: ben
data.value: I don’t drink in the winter.
